show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
2015: Getting A Heads Up On What the New Year Will Bring We’re just about done with 2014—a great relief, most would... <!--more--> say, considering the rough year we’ve had.
Here we are, on the cusp of a new year.
Dare we hold out hope that things will be better in 2015?
Or, do we brace ourselves for The Sequel?
Leid Stories’ listeners, the most discerning audience on the planet, call it right about what 2015 has in store for us mere mortals.
You’re in that number.
Call in (888-874-4888) and get us ready!
